chunks.title: Solana Foundation Strategic Partnership
chunks.body: Strategic partnership with Solana Foundation establishing NYLA as a key AI agent in the Solana ecosystem. Partnership includes developer grant funding, technical advisory support, and co-marketing opportunities. Solana Foundation provides guidance on best practices, security reviews, and access to core development teams. Collaboration includes Breakpoint conference presence, hackathon sponsorship, and ecosystem tool integration priority.
chunks.summary_en: Strategic Solana Foundation partnership providing grants, technical advisory, and ecosystem integration priority for NYLA.
chunks.summary_zh: 与Solana基金会的战略合作，为NYLA提供资助、技术咨询和生态系统集成优先权。
